review: Great for streaming video. Prime needs more free programs.

review: Its a nifty device.  We kept it because you're supposed to be able to use it in hotel rooms, so far we have not been able to successfully get this to work.

review: good for TV shows, my wifi too slow for streaming movies

review: We love it! makes  streaming Netflix easy as well l as other items

review: Still trying to figure it out.  But I'm happy I have it.

review: Can't complain, everything is working as expected

review: Love my Fire TV Stick. Still working on captioning to make it perfect.
author: Lora Ann Neill

review: So nice and easy to watch Netflix and Amazon, etc. The program is set up to be so user friendly, great for non-techies like me. Best 40 bucks I've spent in a long time!
author: T. Chavez

review: I have one Viziio smart tv, and one Vizio dumb tv.  I installed the Fire Stick in the latter.  Actually, I'm more pleased with the content provided by the Fire Stick than I am with the content of the smart tv.  Further, for those of us who are  technologically challenged, the set up of the Fire Stick was a no brainer.
author: Elizabeth DeBiasi
